CustomField.description: This field captures interest rate change method based on 'Interest Rate Change Method' field value on 'CL Contract' object at the time of rate change. Empty/blank - Keeps the current schedule Keep Same Payment Amount - Changes loan maturity date keeping same installment Change Payment Amount - Changes installment amount keeping same maturity date
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field captures interest rate change method based on 'Interest Rate Change Method' field value on 'CL Contract' object at the time of rate change
CustomField.label: Interest Rate Change Method
